code:
```mmd
flowchart LR
  subgraph GCP[Google Cloud Platform]
    direction TB
    CB[Cloud Build]
    GCR[Google Container Registry / Artifact Registry]
    CR[Cloud Run (managed)]
    SM[Service Management / APIs]
    SM --> CB
    CB --> GCR
    GCR --> CR
  end

  subgraph Repo[Repository]
    ORCH[orchestrator/adk_shim.py]
    SCRIPTS[scripts/deploy_to_cloud_run.sh]
    AGENTS[Agent folders]
    AGENTS -->|Dockerfiles & code| CB
    SCRIPTS --> CB
  end

  subgraph Agents[Cloud Run services]
    direction LR
    YT[youtube-agent]
    SOCIAL[social-media-agent]
    NANO[nano-banana-agent]
    ANALYTICS[analytics-bi-agent]
    USERHIST[user-storage-history-agent]
  end

  ORCH --> AGENTS
  ORCH --> CR
  CR --> Agents
  AGENTS --> GCR

  %% Event flow example
  YT -->|uploads video| SOCIAL
  SOCIAL -->|triggers try-on| NANO
  NANO -->|stores preview| USERHIST
  ANALYTICS -->|consumes events| CR

  classDef infra fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px;
  class GCP,Repo,Agents infra;
```
%% Mermaid architecture diagram for Devpost submission
%% Save as diagrams/architecture.mmd and render with Mermaid for the Devpost assets
graph LR
  subgraph Users
    U[User / Client]
  end

  subgraph CloudRun
    ORCH[Orchestrator Service]
    AG1[Agent Service A]
    AG2[Agent Service B]
    YT[YouTube Agent (optional)]
    CG[Content Generation Agent]
  end

  subgraph GCP
    GCS[Cloud Storage]
    BQ[BigQuery]
    FS[Firestore]
    PubSub[Pub/Sub]
  end

  U -->|HTTP / UI| ORCH
  ORCH -->|RPC / Events| AG1
  ORCH -->|RPC / Events| AG2
  AG1 -->|writes| FS
  AG2 -->|logs| BQ
  CG -->|calls Gemini| (Gemini)
  AG1 -->|uploads| YT
  AG1 -->|stores files| GCS
  ORCH -->|pub/sub| PubSub

  classDef gcp fill:#f5f7ff,stroke:#3b82f6
  class GCS,BQ,FS,PubSub gcp
